attributes.action: Reclose schools and collages to prevent them bringing it home!
attributes.additional_details: Myself being a student at collage feel very uncomfortable and also as a test subject to this covid as your allowing schools and collages to stay open which is mixing with thousands of other households and having the constant worry of am I going to bring it home? You need to reclose them for everyone’s safety!
attributes.background: Reclose the schools and collages for everyone’s safety!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846
